pages.text: This entry serves to keep track of what eyes you have or have not collected. $(br2)Mark the quest pages as complete as you go!

pages.title: What's this?
pages.text: End Remastered changes how you get to the End dimension, because playing vanilla Minecraft with friends proved that progression was a bit too quick for my tastes. $(br2)The next few pages serve as a manual checklist of sorts to help you keep track.
Currently this can be found in mineshafts. Have fun spelunking for this!
